// App Stop Smoking OK Cancel textView Used permission Access Storage Permission:
• Diary: backup and restore to/from sd-card.
• Goal: load and save images for your personal goal.

Grant permissions later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> App info\" and choose \"Permissions\". //Share //Reset Great news: I haven\'t smoked since I failed stop smoking after and I saved: cigarettes and of time. I stopped smoking Reset the time and create a diary entry? // Menu Settings Share Health Overview Diary Goal Save Reset Info Camera Gallery // Main Activity Configure in settings 0.0 € $ £ ¥ ₹ R$ ₽ days hours minutes Stopped smoking at: Not smoked since: Saved: h // Health Activity Congratulations - you did it! Reached in: Blood pressure Blood pressure, body temperature and heart rate return to normal. (20 minutes) Carbon monoxide Smoker\'s breath disappears. For a smoker, about 10% of the red blood cells are blocked by the poisonous gas carbon monoxide. These cells are now available again for oxygen. (8 hours) Heart attack The risk of death by sudden cardiac arrest decreases. (1 day) Sense of smell Your sense of smell and taste buds become more sensitive; smelling and taste is refined. (2 days) Breathing Breathing becomes easier. (3 days) Nicotine withdrawal The physical withdrawal from nicotine is made. (1 week) Capacity The entire blood circulation improves. Increased lung capacity is up by 30 %, The lungs can once more absorb more oxygen. This add an increase to physical performance. (3 months) Lung hairs By now, the fine hairs in the lungs are regrown and smokers cough disappears. Exhaustion and shortness of breath improve progressively. (9 months) Coronary arteries The risk of diseases of the coronary vessels is reduced by half. (1 year) Heart attack The risk of heart attack drops significantly. (2 years) Stroke The risk of having a stroke or developing lung cancer is substantially lower than earlier. Also, the risk of mouth cancer is reduced. (5 years) Lung cancer The risk of lung cancer is the same as a non-smoker. The lungs have almost fully recovered. Pre-cancerous cells are replaced by healthy cells. (10 years) Heart attack The risk of heart attack is barely higher than that of a Non-smoker. (15 years) Pancreatic Cancer the risk of death from smoking-related causes, including both lung disease and cancer, drops to the level of a person who has never smoked in their life. Also, the risk of developing pancreatic cancer has reduced to that of someone who has never smoked. (20 years) // Diary Backup diary Restore diary Delete diary // Notes Entry will be removed. OK? Delete entry Edit entry Share entry Share with: Title Content No supported file extension Please install an app to perform action. Attachment Neutral Happy Sad Smiling Cool Dead Excited Tongue Devil Backup successful. Restore successful. Backup failed. Restore failed. Entry not saved. Cancel editing? Paste actual date Paste actual time Paste line Sort entries Sort by title Sort by emoticon Sort by date //File chooser Choose attachment File manager // Goal Cancel Picture Choose image Rotate image Costs: Already saved: Remaining: // Settings Tabs Statistics Goal tab App Next goal Overview tab Health tab Goal tab Diary tab If you have reached your current goal, you can set here a start date for your next goal. This is necessary to calculate the new time of when you reach the next goal, while keeping the right statistics in the overview tab. Do you want to use the overview tab? In this tab the main statistics are presented: the time of quitting, saved cigarettes, saved money and so on. Do you want to use the health tab? In this tab the progress of your health benefits are presented: risk oh heart attack, cancer and so on. Do you want to use the goal tab? Here you can set a personal goal. Something you want to use the saved money for. Do you want to use the diary tab? Here you can write a diary with your thoughts, problems and something like this. Perhaps it will help you. Personal goal What will you use the saved money for? Please enter a title and the costs of your personal goal. Name of your goal Costs (integer number): 199 Costs Costs of a single cigarette. This is used to calculate the saved money since quitting. What does one cigarette cost? Currency Set your preferred currency Smoke habits Enter the number of cigarettes smoked per day and the time it takes to smoke one cigarette. Number of cigarettes Time in minutes Time When did you stop smoking? Please enter a date and time. Date format Set your preferred date format. App info Open via the system settings the app info. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …). Title already exists. Can not save entry. Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. All entries will be deleted. Search Search in titles Search in content Search in dates Today Yesterday Day before yesterday This month Own search title date emoticon //Intro To Quit Smoking You have decided to quit smoking ? Thanks for choosing \"To Quit Smoking\". It\'s time to quit a bad habit. Features \"To Quit Smoking\" presents you an overview with some statistics and your health benefits. Additionally you can configure a goal (What will you do with the saved money?) and write a diary. Settings Please configure some information about your smoking habits in the settings screen. You can also configure some basic settings (date format, currency, …). Now, let\'s get started … // About About … and other things Changelog, help, license, used libraries and more. Evaluation More Apps Open our store in PlayStore and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) Privacy Policy To Quit Smoking! is strongly committed to protecting your privacy and providing the highest quality secure online experience. Rate Us We have a big favor to ask all of you who have used our app. It should only take a minute of your time but it will mean the world to us. Intro Show the intro screen one more time. //License Dialog About For more information visit our site on :
https://github.com/odogwudev

This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Service and the choices you have associated with that data. We use your data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions. Information Collection And Use We collect several different types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Service to you. Types of Data Collected Personal Data While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you Personal Data. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to Cookies and Usage Data Usage Data When you access the Service by or through a mobile device, we may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device you use, your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of your mobile device, your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser you use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data Usage Data Tracking Cookies Data We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device. Tracking technologies also used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze our Service. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service. Examples of Cookies we use: Session Cookies. We use Session Cookies to operate our Service. Preference Cookies. We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings. Security Cookies. We use Security Cookies for security purposes. If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us https://github.com/odogwudev //Info Dialog Source of information http://www.onmeda.de/rauchen/rauchfrei.html

The sources of the above mentioned website are:

Online-information of American Cancer Society: www.cancer.org (31.01.2011)

Online-information of Bundeszentrale für gesundheitliche Aufklärung (BZgA): www.rauchfrei-info.de (Stand: 2010)

Online-information of Deutschen Hauptstelle für Suchtfragen e.V. (DHS): www.dhs.de (Stand: 2007)

Harmful Effects @drawable/tip1 @drawable/tip2 @drawable/tip3 @drawable/tip4 @drawable/tip5 @drawable/tip6 @drawable/tip7 @drawable/tip8 @drawable/tip9 @drawable/tip10 @drawable/tip11 @drawable/tip12 @drawable/tip13 ca-app-pub-1900344374753875/4024189469 ca-app-pub-1900344374753875~8075131029 ca-app-pub-1900344374753875/5145699446 ca-app-pub-1900344374753875/3449474392 //Quotes Smoking is a habit that drains your money and kills you slowly, one puff after another. Quit smoking, start living. Replacing the smoke on your face with a smile today will replace illness in your life with happiness tomorrow. Quit now. Looking for motivation to quit smoking? Just look into the eyes of your loved ones and ask yourself if they deserve to die because of your second hand smoke. If you don’t quit smoking, you risk disease and death. But if you do, you will get happiness and good health. All the suffering, stress and addiction comes from not realizing you already are what you are looking for. It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped. You don’t need cigarettes to be complete. All the happiness, comfort and peace you seek, is already inside you. Quitting smoking is rather a marathon than a sprint. It is not a one-time attempt, but a longer effort. The surest way not to fail is to determine to succeed. You\'re always better off if you quit smoking; it\'s never too late.. Our strength grows out of our weakness. At least three times every day take a moment and ask yourself what is really important. Have the wisdom and the courage to build your life around your answer. Every time you try to quit smoking you are actually getting closer to staying smoke-free. Our greatest glory is not in never falling but in rising up every time we fail. When you are going through hell, keep on going. Never never give up. Don’t let the fear of the time it will take to accomplish something stand in the way of your doing it. It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop. Smokers don\'t grow old…they die young. Giving up doesn\'t always mean you are weak, sometimes it means you are strong enough and smart enough to let go. The best time to quit smoking was the day you started, the second-best time to quit is today. // rate us string Do you like Your rating will help us to do better. That\'s not the experience we\'d like you to have. Please share your feedback below. Uh oh! Could you tell us more about what we could improve? Thanks for your Feedback, is there something specific that you think we could improve? Thank you! your feedback inspires us to improve. Would you mind giving us a 5? Thanks! Your awesome feedback just made our day! please rate us on Play Store. Write Feedback Suggest us what went wrong and we\'ll work on it Rate DEV UI QA OP PM //share message This is a good app that will help you to quit smoking! \n To Quit Smoking
